original_text: Yes, you who live in heaven, be happy! Be happy because God has punished Babylon! God's people and his apostles and his prophets, be happy! God has punished the city because of what she did to you. Yes, you who live in heaven, be happy! Be happy because God has punished Babylon! God's people and his apostles and his prophets, be happy! God has punished the city because of what she did to you. Yes, you who live in heaven, be happy!
korean_text: 하늘과 성도들과 사도들과 선지자들아, 그로 말미암아 즐거워하라 하나님이 너희를 위하여 그에게 심판을 행하셨음이라 하더라

sentences.original_text: Yes, you who live in heaven, be happy!
Be happy because God has punished Babylon!
God's people and his apostles and his prophets, be happy!
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 백성과 그의 사도들과 그의 예언자들아, 기뻐하라!

sentences.original_text: God has punished the city because of what she did to you.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 그 성을 벌하셨으니, 그가 너희에게 행한 것 때문이다.

sentences.original_text: Yes, you who live in heaven, be happy!
Be happy because God has punished Babylon!
God's people and his apostles and his prophets, be happy!
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 백성과 그의 사도들과 그의 예언자들아, 기뻐하라!

sentences.original_text: God has punished the city because of what she did to you.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 그 성을 벌하셨으니, 그가 너희에게 행한 것 때문이다.

sentences.original_text: Yes, you who live in heaven, be happy!
